nodes.text: Starhunter menagerie arks were large space transports designed to carry cargoes of multiple species of animals—or even sentient beings being treated as such.

One early ship of this type was the Starhunter Dhelba, which crashed on Endor about 800 BBY, introducing Teeks, Gupins, and tree goats to the moon. Another ship of this type was used by the Starhunter's Intergalactic Menagerie during the early years of the Galactic Empire.
